Scripts.OnShow: if self:GetParent():GetSize()then local x,y = self:GetParent():GetSize() self:SetSize(x,10) end
Scripts.OnClick: if type(self.func) == "function" then self.func(self) end self:GetParent().selectbuttonID=self:GetID() self:GetParent():Hide()

Scripts.OnUpdate: if BigfootSuitDropDownMenu.selectbuttonID and BigfootNewMainFrame_BigfootSuitDropDownMenu_GetNameById(BigfootSuitDropDownMenu.selectbuttonID) then self:SetText(BigfootNewMainFrame_BigfootSuitDropDownMenu_GetNameById(BigfootSuitDropDownMenu.selectbuttonID)) else self:SetText(BF_SUITBUTTON_CUSTOM) end
